about_the_game:
Rebuild the Grand Library

The Grand Library has burned. No longer can the magi use spells handed down for generations. They must uncover the ancient art of spell crafting. Rebuild the Grand Library and fill it with spells of your own creation. Defeat enemies as you search for powerful components to bend the elements to your will.

Create your own spells


Features a voxel based spell crafting system with emergent elemental properties and runes to further control your creations, your ingenuity is the limit. The elements are at your command

Toss enemies with your might


Feel the impact of your magic, with physics to throw and smash enemies

Face powerful foes

Dash between your enemies in this first person spell-slinger, featuring a variety of enemies that you will have to overcome in unique ways. Loot them and take their power for your own, summon them to fight for you, take their spells or craft more powerful versions of your own. Features a multitude of unique enemies with differing abilities and spells across several levels

Bring a friend

Conquer the world together with PVE and show off your ingenuity with your spells

short_description: Dash between your foes an unleash spells of your own creation. Build your own magic peice by peice, gather the elements and mark them with runes to do your will. Your weapons are creativity and intellect in this first-person spell-slinger where YOU are the spell designer.
